column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " This is the last chakra , is n't it ? "
#Text=Pathik says : " Yes .
#Text=" Pathik says : " The Thought Chakra is located at the crown of the head .
#Text=It deals with pure cosmic energy , and is blocked by earthly attachment .
#Text=Meditate on what attaches you to this world .
#Text=Now , let all of those attachments go .
#Text=Let them flow down the river , forgotten .
#Text=" Aang says : " What ?
#Text=Why would I let go of Katara ?
#Text=I ... I love her !
#Text=" Pathik says : " Learn to let her go , or you can not let the pure cosmic energy flow in from the universe .
#Text=" Aang says : " Why would I choose cosmic energy over Katara ?
#Text=How could it be a bad thing that I feel an attachment to her ?
#Text=Three chakras ago that was a good thing !
#Text=" Pathik says : " You must learn to let go .
#Text=" Katara says : " Thank goodness you 're here , Suki .
#Text=Something terrible is going on .
#Text=The Fire Nation has infiltrated the city , I just saw Prince Zuko and his uncle !
#Text=We have to tell the Earth King right away !
#Text=" Azula says : " Oh , do n't worry , I 'll be sure to let him know .
#Text=" Azula says : " So , Zuzu 's in the city , too ?
#Text=I think it 's time for a family reunion .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm sorry , but I ca n't let go of Katara .
#Text=" Pathik says : " Aang , to master the Avatar State , you must open all the chakras .
#Text=Surrender yourself .
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay , I 'll try .
#Text=" Pathik says : " Now think of your attachments and let them go .
#Text=Let the pure cosmic energy flow .
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara 's in danger !
#Text=I have to go !
#Text=" Pathik says : " No , Aang !
#Text=By choosing attachment , you have locked the chakra !
#Text=If you leave now , you wo n't be able to go into the Avatar State at all !
#Text=" Yu says : " It 's another one her tricks !
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " There 's a giant hole in the box !
#Text=How is that a trick !?
#Text=" Toph says : " It 's not !
#Text=It 's the real deal !
#Text=" Toph says : " I am the greatest earthbender in the world !
#Text=Do n't you two dunderheads ever forget it !
#Text=" Xin Fu says : " I 'm going to be stuck in here forever with you , are n't I ?
#Text=" Yu says : " I have to go the bathroom .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Ready to go knock some Fire Nation heads ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " You do n't know how much this means to me , Dad .
#Text=I 'll make you proud and I 'll finally prove to you what a great warrior I am .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Sokka , you do n't have to prove anything to me .
#Text=I 'm already proud of you and I 've always known you 're a great warrior .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Really ?
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Why do you think I trusted you to look after our tribe when I left ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " This ca n't be good news .
#Text=" Azula says : " What is this about ?
#Text=Your agents show up in the middle of the night and drag me down here ?
#Text=You will not treat a Kyoshi Warrior this way !
#Text=" Long Feng says : " But you 're not a Kyoshi Warrior , are you , Princess Azula of the Fire Nation ?
#Text=" Azula says : " What do you want ?
#Text=" Long Feng says : " I want to make a deal .
#Text=It 's time that I regain control of Ba Sing Se and you have something I need .
#Text=" Azula says : " Oh ?
#Text=" Long Feng says : " The Earth King 's trust .
#Text=" Azula says : " Why should I help you ?
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Because I can get you the Avatar .
#Text=" Azula says : " I 'm listening ... " Royal messenger says : " A message from the Royal Palace .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I ... I ca n't believe it !
#Text=" Zuko says : " What is it , Uncle ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " Great news !
#Text=We 've been invited to serve tea to the Earth King !

#Text=" Main Aang Appa Hakoda Iroh Katara Momo Pathik Sokka Toph Zuko Antagonists Azula Long Feng Mai Master Yu Ty Lee Xin Fu says : " Minor Bato Bosco Kuei Royal messenger " Sokka says : " It 's pricey ... but I really do like it .
#Text=" Katara says : " Then you should get it , you deserve something nice .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do , do n't I ?
#Text=But no , it 's too expensive .
#Text=I should n't .
#Text=" Katara says : " All right , then do n't .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You know what ?
#Text=I 'm gon na get it .
#Text=" Flyer distribution man says : " Psst , psst !
#Text=Hey , you kids love earthbending ?
#Text=You like ... throwing rocks ?
#Text=Then check out Master Yu 's Earthbending Academy .
#Text=" Aang says : " Look !
#Text=There 's a coupon on the back !
#Text=The first lesson is free .
#Text=" Katara says : " Who knows ?
#Text=This Master Yu could be the earthbending teacher you 've been looking for .
#Text="
